title: Amour sans limite
overview: In Amour sans limite, we follow the sincere quest for people living with a difference and all looking for a true love. Throughout the series, we accompany singles with a varied profile in their meeting process. Each story highlights a different obstacle, always with a benevolent look. Supported by Vanessa, Émilie and Darlène, the bidders of the adapted meeting agency, will our singles manage to find a soul mate by sailing in the unpredictable world of dating?
